original_title: 心霊盗撮ビデオ 呪われた鑑賞会
overview: In 2009, the corpse of a young woman was found in her apartment. After it was determined by police that she had committed suicide, several others around her had begun to disappear.
tagline: If you see it...you will be killed.
title: Psychic Voyeur Video Cursed Appreciation Party
